level.heading: Limit on aggregate amount of federal funds for public school and private school programs.
level.text: The aggregate amount authorized to be appropriated to the District of Columbia for the programs under §§ 38-2702 and 38-2704 for any fiscal year may not exceed -
$17,000,000, in the case of the aggregate amount for fiscal year 2003;
$17,000,000, in the case of the aggregate amount for fiscal year 2004; or
$17,000,000, in the case of the aggregate amount for fiscal year 2005.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in § 38-2702 and § 38-2704.
